title: Intermediate Stationary Bike Weight Loss Workout for Belly Fat. 40 Minutes
description:
Adrian's Fat Loss System ➜ https://bit.ly/__CLICK__HERE ➜ Lose 30 Pounds (𝗼𝗳 𝗕𝗲𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗙𝗮𝘁) EVERY 30 Days
.
.
"Adrian, I 𝗟𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝟮𝟮 𝗣𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝟮𝟯 𝗗𝗮𝘆𝘀. Why Haven't I Lost 30 By Now!?"  -𝙽𝚊𝚘𝚖𝚒 𝚆𝚒𝚕𝚎𝚢 ➜ https://bit.ly/__CLICK__HERE ➜ Adrian's Fat Loss System
.
.

ANY WORKOUT will help you LOSE BELLY FAT! A stationary bike doesn't have magical 'belly fat burning' powers.

I used the words "Targets Belly Fat" to motivate you to do this workout and YES,

You'll lose belly fat and weight all over your body. How fast you lose weight along with belly fat depends on how overweight you are. Basically, the bigger your stomach = the faster you'll lose belly fat.

The only time you can target belly fat is when you're down to your last 10-to-20 pounds. At that point, most of the fat you have left to lose is in your belly area.

Here’s more STATIONARY BIKE WORKOUTS to Lose Weight,

10 Minute BEGINNER https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MOIhG2GbZ3c 
30 Minute BEGINNER https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G8cvg2i2r48 

40 Minute INTERMEDIATE Level 1 👈 0:00 YOU JUST DID THIS ONE
30 Minute INTERMEDIATE Level 2 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_m_xW0patsk 

60 Minute ADVANCED https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rY8oEc9WqK4 
30 Minute EXTREME https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zzXr0bhL7s0  

RECUMBENT BIKE Workout for ABSOLUTE BEGINNERS https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0tlNyrdMfn4

Use the Bike’s MANUAL or QUICKSTART program. Pedal AS FAST AS POSSIBLE (without adjusting the tension) to BURN FAT as fast as possible. 

SORRY, the Gold's Gym 290 C Stationary Exercise Bike used by @AdrianBryant in the workout video is no longer available but...  Any stationary bike like https://amzn.to/3CB7hh1 is good for weight loss.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2M1BabvgEHE to see the weight loss results people got from doing  @AdrianBryant    workouts

Adrian’s Elliptical Weight Loss Workouts https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5qWKDYV54nGTA04wnMmZ2VvhOQFGUrC-

I've decided to try this workout everyday and it has really changed my energy levels are high, no more caffeine break in the afternoon, and my pants are getting big on me! Thanks for sharing your video and for sharing your love of health and happiness! See you tomorrow 😊
This is the only guy out there who actually knows what the hell he's doing!

Adrian Bryant,  I am so grateful to have found your workouts on the bike. I have had 2 Spinal fusions and a total knee replacement, and I have degenerative disc disease. I use my recumbent bike, and I am finally able to take control over my own body, I have lost 20 lbs so far and am getting better able to control my health. Thank you and keep up the GREAT  WORK!!!!

I have lost a kilo per week for the last ten weeks, since I started your bike workouts. Brilliant stuff man. I used the bike before and got no results. I am now in my healthy BMI. Thank you for all the vids : ) and motivation. Always working out watching with the help of your videos.
